Service Details: - Provides 3 building, 2 level complex family housing for those who qualify- Initial share cost for co-op accommodation is required
How to Apply: - Send a self-addressed, stamped envelope to have an application form sent to you- Fill out the application form, including as much information regarding your household, income, and skills to help the selection committee determine suitability for available units, then mail back
Address & Map: 1961 Dunn StKelowna, BC     V1Y 4C4View MapQuest Map
